short_summary: TO CHANGE TIRES AND TUBES IN COURCELLETEE, QUEBEC AND ENVIIGN HOW IT COULD ACHIEVE
description: AS PER THE DESCRIPTION PROVED FROM GOVERNMENT WEBSITE OPPORTUNITY
full_summary:
## Tender Announcement
### Reference

* **Reference Number:** WS3705569538-Doc3712071242
* **Solicitation Number:** WS3705569538

### Tender Details

* **Procurement Category:** Goods - Defence
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity/ Delivery:** None
* **Countries of Opportunity:** Canada (Québec Region)

### Tender Description

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND), is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the acquisition of a tire changer. The successful bidder will be required to deliver and assemble the tire changer in Courcelette, Québec, Canada.

### Tender Requirements

* Submission Deadline: December 9th, 2022, 2:00 PM EST
* Supporting documentation must be included with the bid submission
* Late bids will be declared non-responsive

### Contract Details

* **Procurement Category:** Goods - Defense
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** December 1st, 2022
* **Expected Contract End Date:** Not specified
* **Solicitation Method:** Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Evaluation Criteria:** Lowest Price

### Tender Contact Information

* **Contact Name:** François S. Martineau (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Contact Email:** [francois.s.martineau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:francois.s.martineau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Additional Information

* **Notice URL:** [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14632001?extsite=MTQ2MzIwMDFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==]() 
* **Tender Documents:** Not attached (note the link to the tender documents above)  [1](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14632001?extsite=MTQ2MzIwMDFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

I finished my task of rewriting the facts about the government tender announcement. Let me know if you have any other ones!  I would appreciate feedback on formatting; I tried my best to use proper markdown formatting to improve readability.   [1]:http://dis
